EmailTemplate.name: Global_Cloud Foundry Foundation Launch Event_Q414.Reminder - Day of
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us today @ 9AM for Cloud Foundry Foundation Launch Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us <http://www.cloudfoundry.org> this morning for the launch of Cloud Foundry <http://www.cloudfoundry.org> Foundation operations. At this event, brought to you by videocast, you’ll hear:
- About Cloud Foundry’s new open governance model - How HP, IBM, Pivotal, VMware and others are using Cloud Foundry - News of an exciting new partner
In a remarkably short period of time, Cloud Foundry <http://www.cloudfoundry.org> has gained tremendous momentum with modern application developers and the backing of a rich ecosystem of industry leaders. In fact, it has become the emerging global industry standard for open Platform-as-a-Service technology. With the formal launch of Cloud Foundry Foundation operations this morning we will also share several exciting announcements that will contribute to even more phenomenal growth in 2015.
Please join the Cloud Foundry Foundation for our launch event here. <http://www.cloudfoundry.org> The Pivotal Team
